column3: After securing venture capital funding, CEOs must actively evolve their investor relationships from fundraising pitch mode to ongoing partnership mode to maximize value from board members
column4: "Once you have their capital in the bank, that relationship needs to evolve: from pitching to partnership. And in a partnership, you as the CEO should expect that person, the VC, to help you make your company successful."
column7: The Case of the Boardroom Blow-up
